sentences.en: At the banquet table, I had the good fortune to sit vis - a - vis an old school chum.
sentences.cn: 在宴会桌上, 我恰巧坐在一位老同学的对面.

sentences.en: At the banquet table, I had the good fortune to sit visvis an old school chum.
sentences.cn: 我有幸和一位昔日的老校友坐在宴会桌的对面.

sentences.en: Good luck chum and mountains of happiness and good cheer on this auspicious day, Your Birthday!
sentences.cn: 世上如有诤友, 那就是像你对我那样关怀的朋友.祝你生日快乐!

sentences.en: Her chum said that South Korea is a scary place.
sentences.cn: 她的朋友说南韩是个疯狂的地方.

sentences.en: How are we gonna get our truck in there, pal? - Just leaves it to me, chum!
sentences.cn: 我们怎样才能让我们的卡车到那里, 伙计? - 交给我来办吧, 老朋友!

sentences.en: I notice it did not take Julian long to chum up with the new secretary.
sentences.cn: 我注意到朱利安没多久就和新秘书交上了朋友.

sentences.en: In Taipei he met a boyhood chum.
sentences.cn: 他在台北遇见一位童年时期的拍档.

sentences.en: Many fishermen swear by chum or'ground baits'that really stink!
sentences.cn: 许多渔民指着密友或'地面诱饵'真的很臭!

sentences.en: See you, old chum. Give me a ring.
sentences.cn: 再见, 老兄,给我来电话吧.

sentences.en: Sorry, chum, we got orders to blot you out.
sentences.cn: 对不起啦, 伙计, 我们接到命令要把你干掉.

sentences.en: There's your old chum, Francis Getliffe and his friends.
sentences.cn: 还有你的老朋友法兰西斯?盖特列夫以及他的朋友们.

sentences.en: They used to chum in with each other in the past.

sentences.cn: 对同房间的人狡黠地眨了眨眼.

sentences.en: You see I would rather chum with the few mechanics there were in that station.
sentences.cn: 你们看,我倒情愿与那站上的那几个机修工交朋友.
